title: Zombie Survival Crew: Undead Is Not An Option
description: Zombie love… Zombie hate… How to get your killing spree on… Join the Zombie Survival Crew on a slalom through stories, articles, and artwork which will take you on the zombie-ride of your life. They range from creepy, to bittersweet to downright spine-tingling horror. And with assistance from cast members of television’s The Walking Dead, the ZSC will prepare you to "meat" any challenge.
author: L.K. Gardner-Griffie
